IO
==

 This module is used to handle all input/output operations. A sub-module is dedicated to each directory of the data folder,
handling only operations related to files being read/written to this directory.


.. toctree::
    :caption: Reference 
    :maxdepth: 2

    io/converted
    io/diagnostics
    io/extracted
    io/ids
    io/merged
    io/ppt
    io/selection
    io/source
    io/utils
